metadata.title: CVE-2018-10243 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: htp_parse_authorization_digest in htp_parsers.c in LibHTP 0.5.26 allowsremote attackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via anauthorization digest header.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libhtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
htp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
